duck: Effectuation is a set of decision-making principles expert entrepreneurs are observed to employ in situations of uncertainty.
ef읁ec읎u으t은d, ef읁ec읎u으t을ng, ef읁ec읎u으tes To bring about; effect.

milestones: Judge in Nebraska says thou shalt not sue God
Nebraska Senator sues God
Bail denied in Laos overthrow plot, Hmong protest

wiki.text:
'Effectuation' is a set of decision-making principles expert entrepreneurs are
observed to employ in situations of uncertainty. The alternative to
effectuation, causality, describes decision-making heuristics rooted in
prediction.

Sarasvathy contrasts the traditional sequence of analysis, planning,
implementation and control with effectuation as building on known capabilities
for possible ends.<ref> {{cite book
| last = Davidsson first = Per title = The Entrepreneurship Research Challenge
| url = http://books.google.com/books?id=WcwMLPJyn7wC accessdate = 20130125 year
| = 2008 publisher = Edward Elgar Publishing isbn = 9781847202192 page = 80
| quote = [...] effectuation logic takes a set of means as given and focuses on
| selection between possible effects that can be achieved with these means.
}} </ref>
wiki.title: effectuation
